input.sentences: at the party | the woman could not wait to tell her friend a secret .
other friends at the party acted silly for the camera .
the party gave two friends a chance to catch up on what was happening in their lives .
the woman had a great story to tell her friend | complete with gestures !
by the end of the night | one party goer had to rest and show off .
output.sentences: Two guests that are attending a surprise party for someone.
Looks like there might be a little dancing going on at this party.
And maybe a little drinking and dancing being enjoyed at the party.
The couple looks to be enjoying themselves but the man in the background is not having fun.
Now it's time to play games.
